scripts.custom-name: typedoc --namedParamName someOtherName --out docs/custom src && open docs/custom/modules.html
scripts.no-detect: typedoc --detectNamedParamFromComments false --out docs/no-detect src && open docs/no-detect/modules.html
scripts.no-detect-no-change-tag: typedoc --detectNamedParamFromComments false --changeNamedParamTag false --out docs/no-detect-no-change-tag src && open docs/no-detect-no-change-tag/modules.html
scripts.no-change-tag: typedoc --changeNamedParamTag false --out docs/no-change-tag src && open docs/no-change-tag/modules.html
scripts.test: pnpm default-name & pnpm custom-name & pnpm no-detect & pnpm no-detect-no-change-tag & pnpm no-change-tag
